text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
—And this is an infinitive. It means using 
a verb as a noun, adjective, or adverb. 
Got all that?

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Woah, cool! Now that's the Fuji-san 
I know! I always thought it meant 
it'd go on forever, like infinity!

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Aight, I'm so ready! Talking with even 
rando tourists on the streets is gonna 
be a piece of cake now!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Heheheh. Is that so? Well then… 
Shall we have a little chat to 
try that out?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
……I'm so hungry. 
Do you know any good 
restaurants around here?

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
…Uh～ So… hun… a-any goo? 
Arando… Aran? Who's that? 
Uhhhhh——

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
…Sorry! Gimme a hint, please? 
Just one!

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
！ I got it! Okay, okay! I know, 
super good ramen shop! Let's go! 
Your food, I pay!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Ahahahaha! Yup, I'm sure you'll be 
fine conversing with anyone from 
anywhere, Pokke!
